table.style: border: 0px #F0F0F0 solid; font-size: 11px; font-family: verdana; vertical-align: top;

tr.style: border: 1px #F0F0F0 solid; font-size: 11px; font-family: verdana; vertical-align: top

th.style: vertical-align: top; text-align : var(--ig-left,left); background-color: white; border: 0px #F0F0F0 solid; padding:0px 4px 0px 4px; padding-top: 3px; padding-bottom: 3px

a.title: The logical name of the element

th.style: vertical-align: top; text-align : var(--ig-left,left); background-color: white; border: 0px #F0F0F0 solid; padding:0px 4px 0px 4px; padding-top: 3px; padding-bottom: 3px

description.value: Statement about using a substance (such as tobacco, alcohol, drugs, etc).

definition.value: Statement about using a substance (such as tobacco, alcohol, drugs, etc).

short.value: Common header for all patient-related data

definition.value: Common header for all patient-related data

short.value: Author(s) by whom the resource was/were authored. Multiple authors could be provided.

definition.value: Author(s) by whom the resource was/were authored. Multiple authors could be provided.

short.value: Date and time of the last update to the resource (may be used for technical corrections).

definition.value: Date and time of the last update to the resource (may be used for technical corrections).

short.value: Status of the patientâ€™s alcohol use.

definition.value: Status of the resource or document

short.value: Reason for the current status of the resource.

definition.value: Reason for the current status of the resource.

short.value: Language in which the resource is written. Language is expressed by the IETF language tag.

definition.value: Language in which the resource is written. Language is expressed by the IETF language tag.

short.value: Time period for which this observation about substance use is applicable

definition.value: Time period for which this observation about substance use is applicable

short.value: The extent of the patientâ€™s alcohol use in units of alcohol per time period.

definition.value: The extent of the patientâ€™s alcohol use in units of alcohol per time period.
